alert.note: Alert for Baca County Including Springfield and Eastern Comanche Grasslands (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued March 13 at 3:55AM MDT until March 13 at 7:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A Red Flag warning is in effect from noon to 7 pm Today for low humidity values and gusty winds for fire weather zone 237...which includes Baca County... ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 7 PM MDT THIS EVENING FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONE 237... * Affected Area...Fire Weather Zone 237. * Winds...South 10 to 20 mph with gusts up to 35 mph. * Relative Humidity...As low as 11 percent.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Baca County Including Springfield and Eastern Comanche Grasslands
